Package model

Class Superuser

java.lang.Object
model.Superuser
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Superuser extends Object implements Serializable
The Superuser class manages user-related functions and user persistence. Author: Farhan Shah
See Also:

      public boolean exists(String username)
      Checks if a user with the given username exists.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      True if the user exists, false otherwise.

    • checkUser

      public boolean checkUser(String user)
      Checks if the provided username and password match a user in the list. If a match is found, sets the current user and logs in.
      Parameters:
      user - The username to check.
      Returns:
      True if login is successful, false otherwise.

    • getUserIndex

      public int getUserIndex()
      Gets the index of the current user in the list.

      Returns:
